channel.title: Run Server Error
channel.description:
Ok for those of you that read my last post about JDK ..I GOT IT YAY!!
but in the process i got a new source then went back to the one i had...
now the run server is saying javac is not an internal or external command press any button to continue blah blah blah..dont really remember or know whats wrong.
anyone know what to edit it with or what to do??

item.title: Run Server Error
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Did you right click your old compiler, replace the x in 1.6_0X with the version of JDK you have?

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Error
item.dc:creator: @ma_y_b3_mage ma y b3 mage
item.description:
@ma_y_b3_mage wrote:

that doesnt do anything to run server , when i hit run server i get ‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command…etc. press any button to continue…what do i do to get ‘java’ as a command and run my server?

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Error
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

replace your compiler with this

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Error
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

runeserver should only contain

java server
